name: Ronan The Accuser
description: As the Supreme Public Accuser of the Kree Empire, Ronan serves to deliver Kree judgment and justice across the galaxy. Stern and uncompromising in his application of Kree law, Ronan has fought both with and against many groups. Armed with his Universal Weapon, Ronan has proven himself a threat rightly feared by all who dare cross the Kree.
